reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Fighting malaria through high impact prevention and treatment interventions

description.narrative: Mali - Malaria - Catholic Relief Services - United States Conference of Catholic Bishops - CRS Mali. This program has the following goals: D'ici 2024, réduire le taux de mortalité lié au paludisme d’au moins 50% par rapport à 2015 / By 2024, reduce the malaria death rate by at least 50% compared to 2015.. D’ici 2024, réduire l’incidence du paludisme d’au moins 50% par rapport à 2015 / By 2024, reduce the incidence of malaria by at least 50% compared to 2015. The objectives of this program are: Amener au moins 80% de la population des zones à risque de paludisme à dormir sous moustiquaires imprégnées d’insecticide de longue durée d’ici 2024 / At least 80% of the population in areas at risk of malaria sleep under long-lasting insecticide-treated mosquito nets by 2024. Couvrir au moins 60% des femmes enceintes en TPIg (au moins 3 doses) au cours de leur grossesse d’ici 2024 / Cover at least 60% of pregnant women with IPTp (at least 3 doses) during their pregnancy by 2024. Couvrir au moins 100% (par passage) des enfants de 3 à 59 mois en chimio-prévention du paludisme saisonnier (CPS) d'ici 2024 / Cover at least 100% (per round) of children aged 3 to 59 months with seasonal malaria chemoprevention (SMC) by 2024. Assurer la confirmation biologique (TDR ou microscopie) de 100% des cas suspects de paludisme et la prise en charge correcte de 100% des cas de paludisme confirmé à tous les niveaux de la pyramide sanitaire, y compris au niveau des agents de santé communautaires d'ici 2024 / By 2024, ensure the biological confirmation (RDT or microscopy) of 100% of suspected malaria cases and correct management of 100% of confirmed malaria cases at all levels of the health pyramid, including at the level of community health workers. D'ici 2024, améliorer la qualité des interventions en enlevant les obstacles à l’accès aux soins et renforcer les interventions au niveau communautaire / By 2024, improve the quality of interventions by removing barriers to access to services and strengthen interventions at the community level. D'ici 2024, renforcer le système du surveillance, suivi et évaluation et recherche opérationnelle et améliorer la disponibilité et utilisation des données sanitaires de qualité pour la prise de décision à tous les niveaux / By 2024, strengthen the surveillance, monitoring and evaluation and operational research system and improve the availability and use of quality health data for decision-making at all levels. D'ici 2024, renforcer les capacités de coordination et de gestion du Programme à tous les niveaux / By 2024, strengthen the coordination and management capacities of the Program at all levels

title.narrative: Number of long-lasting insecticidal nets distributed to targeted risk groups through continuous distribution
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Percentage of children aged 3–59 months who received the full number of courses of SMC (3 or 4) per transmission season in the targeted areas
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test in the community
Proportion of pregnant women attending antenatal clinics who received three or more doses of intermittent preventive treatment for malaria
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test at public sector health facilities
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment in the community
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment at public sector health facilities
Number of long-lasting insecticidal nets distributed to at-risk populations through mass campaigns
